newProducts.title: Fara-7B
newProducts.description: Microsoft's new efficient agentic AI model specifically designed for computer use and autonomous coding tasks. Features advanced reasoning capabilities for software development.

newProducts.title: ADK-Go
newProducts.description: Google's open-source Go toolkit for building AI agents and autonomous coding tools. Provides a comprehensive framework for developing agentic applications.

newProducts.title: LightRAG
newProducts.description: Retrieval-augmented generation framework designed for AI agents. Features advanced context retrieval for improved coding assistance and knowledge integration.

newProducts.title: Memori
newProducts.description: Open-source memory engine specifically designed for LLMs and AI coding agents. Enables persistent memory and context retention across coding sessions.

newProducts.title: TrendRadar
newProducts.description: AI-powered news sentiment monitoring tool that can be integrated into coding workflows for real-time market and trend analysis during development.

newProducts.title: VERL
newProducts.description: Volcano Engine's reinforcement learning framework specifically optimized for Large Language Models, including applications in code generation and autonomous coding.

newProducts.title: Gemini CLI Coding Assistant
newProducts.description: Collection of tips, tricks, and tools for using Google's Gemini as an agentic coding assistant through command-line interfaces.

newProducts.title: S&box Game Engine
newProducts.description: New open-source game engine launched with comprehensive AI integration capabilities for game development and procedural content generation.

whitelistUpdates.title: Version 2.1 Release with Improved Plan Mode and AI Code Review
whitelistUpdates.description: Cursor released version 2.1 featuring Improved Plan Mode, AI Code Review in Editor, and Instant Grep functionality.

whitelistUpdates.title: Series D Funding Round of $2.3B and $1B ARR Milestone
whitelistUpdates.description: Cursor announced it raised a Series D funding round of $2.3B and passed $1B in annualized revenue, shared in a blog post titled 'Past, Present, and Future.'

whitelistUpdates.title: CLI Stable Release v1.5.16
whitelistUpdates.description: Continue released version 1.5.16 as a direct stable release from the main branch, representing the latest stable build of their continuous AI platform.

whitelistUpdates.title: CLI Stable Release v1.5.15
whitelistUpdates.description: Continue released version 1.5.15 as a direct stable release from the main branch, continuing their rapid release cycle for the continuous AI platform.

insights.title: Claude Opus 4.5, best model in world for coding
insights.description: Simon Willison discusses Claude Opus 4.5 as the current leading model for coding tasks, highlighting its performance improvements and capabilities for developers.

insights.title: Testing and evals remains single hardest problem
insights.description: Simon Willison identifies testing and evaluation as the most challenging problem in AI development, discussing current approaches and limitations.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.title: We should all be using dependency cooldowns
insights.description: Discussion about implementing cooldown periods for package dependencies to improve security and stability in software development.
insights.author: Simon Willison

insights.description: Research paper presenting a novel approach to improving web agents through DOM tree programming and pruning techniques.

insights.description: Research on efficient model and tool orchestration frameworks to enhance AI intelligence and performance.

insights.description: TechCrunch coverage of Anthropic's latest model release featuring enhanced integration capabilities with popular developer tools.
